title: Lemon chicken and broccoli pasta
ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, cut into cubes', '15g butter', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '200g sliced fresh mushrooms', '125ml Italian salad dressing or as needed', '5 tablespoons lemon juice, divided', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of chicken soup', '4 tablespoons milk', 'salt and pepper to taste', '350g tagliatelle pasta', '350g frozen broccoli spears, thawed', '15g butter', '2 teaspoons lemon juice']
